ingredients.usda_source_description: Beef, ground, unspecified fat content, cooked
ingredients.reason_for_choice: Selected FDC ID 172161 (Beef, ground, unspecified fat content, cooked) because it is a general SR Legacy entry for cooked ground beef, which is the primary component of meatloaf. This choice is compositionally relevant as it represents the cooked meat base, and its generic nature is suitable given the lack of specific fat content or preparation method visible in the image. It was preferred over more specific fat content or patty/broiled options as the meatloaf is baked and the exact fat content is unknown.

dishes.weight_calculation_method: Phase2 Gemini visual estimation: 150.0g (Strategy: dish_level, Changed from Phase1: False)
dishes.reason_for_strategy: Phase 1 recommended dish_level as mashed potatoes are a standard prepared dish commonly found in the USDA database. However, upon reviewing the USDA search results for 'Potatoes, mashed, prepared', all top-scoring candidates are branded combo meals (e.g., 'MEATLOAF & MASHED POTATOES'). There are no suitable standalone mashed potato entries. Therefore, the FDC ID for the dish will be set to null to maintain accuracy, as selecting a combo meal would incorrectly include other food components not present in this specific dish.
dishes.reason_for_choice: No compositionally appropriate FDC ID found in the provided USDA candidate list for 'Mashed Potatoes'. All candidates were from incompatible food categories as they were combo meals (e.g., 'MEATLOAF & MASHED POTATOES', 'GRILLED CHICKEN WITH MASHED POTATOES'). Expected category: Standalone prepared mashed potatoes. Nutritional data for this ingredient will be missing to maintain accuracy.
